rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: "So it goes to the brain and causes very, very severe disease." "I would hate to see it [very severe disease] in humans," Webby said.

rationale: The phrase 'very, very severe disease' uses repetition as an intensifier to describe the impact alarmingly.
statement_text: "So it goes to the brain and causes very, very severe disease." "I would hate to see it [very severe disease] in humans," Webby said.
